post.description:
Create a user with the following properties:

- **@id**: a unique identifier
- **@type**: Person
- **name**: a name
- **email**: an email
- **password**: a password

get.description:
Retrieves a user based on a given identifier:

- **NAAN**: Name Assigning Authority Number which uniquely identifies an organization e.g. 12345
- **postfix**: a unique string

delete.description:
Deletes a user based on a given identifier:

- **NAAN**: Name Assigning Authority Number which uniquely identifies an organization e.g. 12345
- **postfix**: a unique string

post.description:
Create a group with the following properties:

- **@id**: a unique identifier
- **@type**: evi:Organization
- **name**: a name
- **owner**: an existing user in its compact form with @id, @type, name, and email

get.description:
Retrieves a group based on a given identifier:

- **NAAN**: Name Assigning Authority Number which uniquely identifies an organization e.g. 12345
- **postfix**: a unique string

delete.description:
Deletes a group based on a given identifier:

- **NAAN**: Name Assigning Authority Number which uniquely identifies an organization e.g. 12345
- **postfix**: a unique string

put.description:
Add member to a group based on a given group identifier and member data:

- **NAAN**: Name Assigning Authority Number which uniquely identifies an organization e.g. 12345
- **postfix**: a unique string

Remove member from a group based on a given group identifier and member data:

- **NAAN**: Name Assigning Authority Number which uniquely identifies an organization e.g. 12345
- **postfix**: a unique string

post.description: create metadata record for a file

get.description:
read the data download metadata 

To resolve the metadata
GET /datadownload/ark:99999/ex-upload

To resolve to the file  
GET /datadownload/ark:99999/ex-upload/download

delete.description: delete the data download, removing its content inside minio but leaving a record in mongo

get.summary: Retrieve metadata for a specified ARK
get.description: Resolve Identifier Metadata and Return in JSON-LD
